## Installation

You can install the globe4r from Github:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/globe4r")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(globe4r)

create_globe() %>% 
  globe_pov(-21, 179) %>% # position camera
  globe_bars(
    coords(
      lat, long, 
      altitude = depth,
      color = depth,
      label = stations # on hover label
    ), 
    data = quakes
  ) %>% 
  scale_bars_color() %>% 
  scale_bars_altitude()
```
